Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 21st overall pick, by Boston in 2016...
Injured on 8/22/2016 with a Sore Knee, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/15/2016, off Pedro Lazpita (NY)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/13/2018, off Dennis Lam (BRO)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2018, hitting .600 with 0 HR, 2 RBI...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,178,571 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 7 runs against New York on 7/23/2020...
Had 6 hits with 3 RBI against Seattle on 8/26/2020...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,528,571 through salary arbitration...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Chicago on 8/8/2021...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,680,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/20/2022 with a Broken Foot, out for 6 weeks...
10/20/2022: Signed a contract extension with Boston, $1,650,000 per year, for 4 years.
